# delegate

**Instance Property**

The rule editor’s delegate.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor weak var delegate: (any NSRuleEditorDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Configuring the Delegate

- **NSRuleEditorDelegate**: The `NSRuleEditorDelegate` protocol defines the optional methods implemented by delegates of [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSRuleEditor] objects.
